description: Reflections of Allen:  If the image of absoulte masculine beauty is your desire, then you will want allen.  A perfect musular body, manly face and the ability to satisfy the hunger of all who long to feel such a large and beautiful part of his manhood.  With long smooth strokes, Allen fills his hands with the warm feeling of his own solid member.  Standing erect and with every reason to be proud, he slowly turns and his body begins to tremble as he moans 'Take me, take me' and begins to eject the ultimate feeling in man.  This new film of Allen is in response to your repeated requests for more of Allen after his first film.
title: Badlands, Scene #05
